Class DescriptorHorizontalLongitude

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs350s21project.view.A_Descriptor<_DESCRIPTOR_,​_MAPPER_,​_RENDERER_,​_AXIS_>

        • cs350s21project.view.DescriptorHorizontalLongitude
  • public class DescriptorHorizontalLongitude
extends A_DescriptorHorizontal<DescriptorHorizontalLongitude,​MapperLongitude,​RendererLongitude,​Longitude>
    Defines a descriptor for a horizontal view representing longitude.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DescriptorHorizontalLongitude​(Longitude origin, Longitude extent, Longitude interval)
      Creates a horizontal descriptor for longitude with a default zoom step of 10 seconds.
      DescriptorHorizontalLongitude​(Longitude origin, Longitude extent, Longitude interval, Longitude step)
      Creates a horizontal descriptor for longitude.
